channel.title: Constant error when trying to add NPC's
channel.description:
I am constantly getting this error whenever I try to add an NPC:
[IMG]http://i38.photobucket.com/albums/e120/cardboard-box/dsss.jpg[/img]
I have been able to Add only Goblins and Muggers(I've only tried like 6 different NPC's.). I suppose that many of the NPC's might just not work at all. (I am using TestScape Source)
Is there anyway to know which NPC's will work?

item.title: Constant error when trying to add NPC's
item.dc:creator: @KiIIer KiIIer
item.description:
@KiIIer wrote:

you need to add co-ords where the 0’s are or they cant walk anywhere at all only in co-ord 0 0.

Read full topic
item.source: Constant error when trying to add NPC's

item.title: Constant error when trying to add NPC's
item.dc:creator: @Wolfen_Sty Wolfen Sty
item.description:
@Wolfen_Sty wrote:

This is the last few lines of my autospawn.cfg:

spawn = 175 3246 3450 0 3248 3452 3244 3448 2 Noob Mugger
spawn = 175 3246 3449 0 3248 3451 3244 3447 2 Noob Mugger
spawn = 175 3246 3448 0 3248 3450 3244 3446 2 Noob Mugger
spawn = 175 3246 3447 0 3248 3449 3244 3445 2 Noob Mugger
spawn = 175 3246 3446 0 3248 3448 3244 3444 2 Noob Mugger
spawn = 28 3253 3434 0 0 0 0 0 1 Zoo Keeper

It matches correctly with everything else. (In the .cfg, the bottom line isn’t crooked)

Read full topic
